author: clemencia
body:
New class, QIEDataExtended, adding two new columns to QIEData: QIEbarcode and QIEchannel to allow bookeeping.

The code will break RelVal tests unless a tag is included in prep DB, which was agreed with CondDB experts they'd upload when the new class is in an IB or pre-release.
title: Hcal qie extension for74x
